text: Ohe yara imana enecha! Allahâ€Œke bhayabhakti karo ebam tamra rasulera prati bisbasasthapana karo, tini tamra karuna theke duti ansa tomadera pradana karabena, ara tomadera jan'ya tini ekati aloka sthapana karabena yara madhye tomara patha calate paro, ebam tini tomadera paritrana karate parena. Ara allah paritranakari, aphuranta phaladata
